body_html: As a whole, after reviewing this patch, I feel a bit better about landing it before the refactor happens, after cleanups happen. I don't think it will be that much more burden when we make adjustments. (Maybe this means I'm signing up to do the adjustments :) cc @zdevito @gchanan
